record.dc:title: 170GP22, 15GP22, Greenup County, Kentucky. Hardin Village. Midden Pile, Feature 126.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Fort Ancient Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Close-up of Midden Pit, Feature 126, prior to excavation. Pile of midden material, probably in pit, the outlines of which probably were indeterminable in the occupational stratum. At contact of yellow clay and occupational stratum the pit, filled with dark humitic soil and midden material, became apparent. Pit was flat bottomed, with slightly sloping walls.
record.wpa:comments: More information, including diagram, available at institution.
